title: Rifts RPG - Coat Hanger Edition v0.8
description:
Somebody edited a lot of Rifts RPG books into one large pdf file, combining entries that were spread through many books into concise sections. Great source for setting material. Looks like this one file contains material from the following books: 

Rifts
Rifts Ultimate Edition
Chi-Town Burbs
Rifts Sourcebook 1

Siege on Tolkeen 05: Shadows of Evil
